pageContext.claim: “So when Biden and the radical left want to open borders for MS-13 and others, we want strong borders, we want -- as I've said, we want borders. Without borders, you don't have a country.”
pageContext.analysis: Biden does not support "open borders" and is opposed to decriminalizing the act of crossing the border without authorization, unlike other Democrats such as Julian Castro and Elizabeth Warren. This is another example of Trump pretending he is running against a more left-wing candidate.
